mapper.sql: t_house_application_intermediary.id, t_house_application_intermediary.user_id AS userId, t_house_application_intermediary.organization, t_house_application_intermediary.name, t_house_application_intermediary.phone, t_house_application_intermediary.idcard, t_house_application_intermediary.evidence, t_house_application_intermediary.reason, t_house_application_intermediary.sign_flag AS signFlag, t_house_application_intermediary.status, t_house_application_intermediary.create_time AS createTime, t_house_application_intermediary.update_time AS updateTime, t_house_application_intermediary.note
mapper.select: SELECT t_house_application_intermediary.* FROM t_house_application_intermediary WHERE t_house_application_intermediary.id = #{id} GROUP BY t_house_application_intermediary.id

SELECT
FROM t_house_application_intermediary
WHERE 1=1
AND t_house_application_intermediary.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.id},'%')
AND t_house_application_intermediary.user_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.userId},'%')
AND t_house_application_intermediary.organization LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.organization},'%')
AND t_house_application_intermediary.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.name},'%')
AND t_house_application_intermediary.phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.phone},'%')
AND t_house_application_intermediary.idcard LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.idcard},'%')
AND t_house_application_intermediary.evidence LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.evidence},'%')
AND t_house_application_intermediary.reason LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.reason},'%')
AND t_house_application_intermediary.sign_flag LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.signFlag},'%')
AND t_house_application_intermediary.status LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.status},'%')
AND t_house_application_intermediary.create_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.createTime},'%')
AND t_house_application_intermediary.update_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.updateTime},'%')
AND t_house_application_intermediary.start_time >= DATE(#{startTime})
AND t_house_application_intermediary.end_time <= DATE(#{endTime}
ORDER BY update_time DESC , create_time DESC
